title: Sony executives tell Daniel Craig to 'shut up' for bashing Bond movie
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 14 (ANI): Daniel Craig has been asked by Sony executives to clamp up after saying that he'd "rather slash his wrists" than play James Bond again.*
Washington D.C., Oct. 14 (ANI): Daniel Craig has been asked by Sony executives to clamp up after saying that he'd "rather slash his wrists" than play James Bond again. According to a newspaper, Sony executives have told the 47-year-old actor to shut up and stop bashing Bond. It is said that there were problems while re-shooting some scenes at the set prior to the release of the film, The Independent reports. A source said that Craig was injured on the set and needed knee surgery, and they were still doing re-shoots last month. Earlier, Daniel Craig, who plays James Bond in 'Spectre,' said that he would rather break a glass and slash his wrists than do another 'Bond' film, adding that all he wanted to do was move on.(ANI) Â»
